title: PCI DSS Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components
description: Assessment form for PCI DSS Requirement 2 compliance

elements.name: req2_1_intro
elements.html: Requirement 2.1: Processes and mechanisms for applying secure configurations to all system components are defined and understood.

elements.name: req2_1_bullet_points
elements.html:
2.1.1 All security policies and operational procedures that are identified in Requirement 2 are:

  • Documented.
  • Kept up to date.
  • In use.
  • Known to all affected parties.

elements.name: req2_2_intro
elements.html: Requirement 2.2: System components are configured and managed securely.

elements.name: req2_2_bullet_points
elements.html:
2.2.1 Configuration standards are developed, implemented, and maintained to:

  • Cover all system components.
  • Address all known security vulnerabilities.
  • Be consistent with industry-accepted system hardening standards or vendor hardening recommendations.
  • Be updated as new vulnerability issues are identified, as defined in Requirement 6.3.1.
  • Be applied when new systems are configured and verified as in place before or immediately after a system component is connected to a production environment.

elements.name: testing_procedures_intro
elements.html:
Testing Procedures and Reporting Details

This section documents the testing procedures, reporting instructions, and assessor responses for validation of the requirements above.

elements.name: testing_procedures_completed
elements.title: Testing Procedures
elements.description: Select all testing procedures that were completed:

choices.text: 2.1.1 Examine documentation and interview personnel to verify that security policies and operational procedures identified in Requirement 2 are managed in accordance with all elements specified in this requirement.
2.1.2.a Examine documentation to verify that descriptions of roles and responsibilities for performing activities in Requirement 2 are documented and assigned.
2.1.2.b Interview personnel with responsibility for performing activities in Requirement 2 to verify that roles and responsibilities are assigned as documented and are understood.
2.2.1.a Examine system configuration standards to verify they define processes that include all elements specified in this requirement.
2.2.1.b Examine policies and procedures and interview personnel to verify that system configuration standards are updated as new vulnerability issues are identified, as defined in Requirement 6.3.1.
2.2.1.c Examine configuration settings and interview personnel to verify that system configuration standards are applied when new systems are configured.
